title: The Ornstein-Uhlenbeck semigroup in exterior domains

Wood, Ian; Geissert, M.; Heck, H.; Hieber, M., (2005) 'The Ornstein-Uhlenbeck semigroup in exterior domains', Archiv der Mathematik 86 pp.554-562 RAE2008</dc:description><dc:description>
Let ? be an exterior domain in It is shown that Ornstein-Uhlenbeck operators L generate C0-semigroups on Lp(?) for p ? (1, ?) provided ?? is smooth. The method presented also allows to determine the domain D(L) of L and to prove Lp ? Lq smoothing properties of etL. If ?? is only Lipschitz, results of this type are shown to be true for p close to 2.</dc:description><dc:description>
